mission.label: Mission
mission.description: give people who struggle with avoidant patterns a gentle way to challenge harsh thoughts—without shame, ads, or data mining.

whatIs.label: What it is:
whatIs.description: a therapeutic framework-informed cognitive restructuring tool that spots thinking traps (catastrophising, mind-reading, etc.) and offers kinder perspectives.

whatIsnt.label: What it isn't:
whatIsnt.description: full psychotherapy, medical advice, or a crisis service.

whoBuilds.label: Who builds it:
whoBuilds.description: just me—Carlos, a software engineer who's lived with AvPD for years and is investing my own time, skills, and will to create the tool I wish I'd had.

whyOpen.label: Why open source:
whyOpen.description: transparency builds trust; anyone can inspect or improve the code.

roadmap.label: Roadmap:
roadmap.description: opt-in community peer support, progress journaling, therapist hand-off export.
